column4: can someone tell me if it is possible to use opera to watch embedded flash videos, I can watch videos on youtube but not if they are embedded else where, it works fine in firefox but i would prefer to use opera. i have the flash plugins installed including the restricted extras
the opera web site has no mention of a way to fix that issue?
I've had a look and I can't see anything, I am not partilcularly computer savvy though so i could have missed something. I shall look again
